description.narrative: By the end of 2018, Education sector can face emergency situations.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
HSS - Risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2018, Education sector can face emergency situations.

description.narrative: A total of 35,258 children (including 17,089 girls) affected by humanitarian situations received learning materials. Enhanced coordination was made possible through the Ministry of Educations' Response Group co-chaired by UNICEF. UNICEF will continue to support emergency actors through capacity building in anticipating and providing timely responses. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018

title.narrative: # of children benefiting from education supply in humanitarian situations
Availability of cross-sectoral coordination mechanism for delivering education in emergencies
